Construction Safety Cards

Are your workers prepared to react to a severe injury?

YOUR PROJECT NAME

EMERGENCY RESPONSE CARD

In the event of injury/incident:

1. If injury is life threatening, dial 911, alert safety team (see back for contact info)

2. If the injury is serious, non-life threatening, proceed to Emergency Room (See back for details), alert safety team.

3. If the injury is non-serious but requires medical attention, proceed to Urgent Care (see back for address), alert safety team

  • A simple, inexpensive, addition to any safety program
  • Fully customizeable with jobsite or contractor logo
  • Available in wallet-sized cards and hardhat stickers
